## 🏃 set var

```{r}
# "GSE12452", "GSE13597", "GSE64634"

```

## run 
```{r}
# run
res_path <- stringr::str_glue("analysis/data/derived_data/{gse_id}")
fs::dir_create(res_path)
gse <- gse_DEG_Enrichr(gse_id, pvalue = "P.Value")
my_export(gse, path = res_path)
save.image(stringr::str_glue("{res_path}/.Rdata"))
```
